headline: Overnight Chia Oats
name: Overnight Chia Oats
description: Overnight chia oats are a delicious breakfast that can help jumpstart your day. Make several jars at a time for a few days of grab-and-go breakfasts.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine almond milk, oats, mashed banana, and chia seeds in a 1-pint jar. Seal with a lid and shake until well combined. Refrigerate until chia seeds have swelled and mixture is thick and gel-like, 8 hours to overnight.
